variant.table: ACL OFFICERS FOR 1988 President: Alan Biermann, Duke University Vice President: Candy Sidner, BBN Laboratories Secretary-Treasurer: Donald Walker, Bell Commu- nications Research Executive Committee (1988-1990): Bruce Ballard, AT&T Bell Laboratories Nominating Committee (1988-1990): William Mann, USC/ISI PEOPLE ON THE MOVE
variant.bodyText: I have, at rather short notice, accepted a job offer from the European Headquarters of "Automated Language Processing Systems" (ALPS in Cortaillod, Switzer- land). My new address is as follows: Beat Buchmann, Automated Language Processing Systems, Route de Boudry 14, 2016 Cortaillod/NE Switzerland. Burghard Rieger moved from Aachen to a full profes- sorship in CL at Trier: Prof. Dr. Burghard Rieger, FB II—Linguistische Datenverarbeitung (LDV/CL), Uni- versitaet Trier, Postfach 38 25, D-5500 Trier, West Germany Our NEW Address is: Prof. Dr. Walther v. Hahn, University of Hamburg, Computer Science Depart- ment, Natural Language Systems Division (NatS), Bo- denstedtstrasse 16, D-2000 Hamburg 50, Federal Re- public of Germany Our telephone numbers and net addresses remain un- changed: Office +40-4123 3315 Walther v. Hahn +40-
variant.footnote: 4123 4529 walther@fkihh.uucp; Claudius Pyka +40- 4123 2573 claude@fkihh.uucp; Martin Schroeder +40-4123 2574 Martin@fkihh.uucp.
